name: Elflemental
description:
A demo of the game I'm currently working on.

Shoot your way out of hordes of bullets to recover the 3 elemental essences of nature!

Move with ARROW KEYS / WASD

Shoot with LEFT CLICK (hold)

Special Attack with RIGHT CLICK

Switch projectiles (when unlocked) with SCROLL

Please give me feedback in the comments, as I will keep working on the game, you can follow updates at https://itch.io/t/1415060/bullet-hell-metroidvania-project

Music by Denzel LORGE
